alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 8:33PM EDT until June 19 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Polk County in central Florida... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jan Phyl Village, or near Auburndale, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Lake Alfred, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, and Polk City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
